Feature.Name: Wicked
Feature.Text: When the bearer is presented with an opportunity to act in a selfish or malevolent way, the item heightens the bearer's urge to do so.

MagicProperty.Name: Property - Wicked
MagicProperty.Description: When the bearer is presented with an opportunity to act in a selfish or malevolent way, the item heightens the bearer's urge to do so.
